An introduction text is simply a text you send to start off a text conversation. \n Whether you’re texting a customer, colleague, or coworker, \n setting the proper tone for your interactions right away is important.

The only really important rule to follow when writing a text message introduction is to keep it focused. \n This isn’t the time to chat about the weatherーget the point across in as few words as possible

Keep your tone friendly and conversational. \n One of the biggest reasons texting is currently so popular is that it’s an intimate way to communicate. \n So, you’ll want to sound like a normal person in your messages.

When you’re introducing yourself to a new client, give them a friendly hello and an option to set up your next meeting. \n Use these sample introduction text messages to start productive, successful conversations with your business contacts.
